title: FPS drops in mid/late game for some reason after patch.
body:
Early game it's okay, 60 to 100 FPS smooth. But after 15 minutes it goes down to 40-50 FPS and it's really annoying. Before the patch it was fine and FPS was always high even in mid/late.

Wtf is this?

replies.body: Yeah happening to me too with the latest 7.22 and macOS High Sierra update

Does this happen every game around 15 min? That might be a good sign that some very specific game file is causing it due to corruption or something. I know our techs have been looking into what could be causing this recently, but I've also started hearing back from some players mentioning the latest Windows Creator Update features have been causing issues in other games as well. 

Do me a favor and first make sure the Game DVR is disabled. It can be known to cause some stuttering in games, so let's start there and let me know if it helps at all.

- Open Settings
- Click on "Gaming"
- In the "Game bar", "Game DVR" and "Game Mode" tabs on the left, make sure everything is disabled.

It's happening to a lot of us, deal with it. 
It's been reported to Riot two weeks ago already and nothing has been done.
